revisions.rev:
The '''[[K-League Cup]] 2009''', known as '''''Peace Cup Korea 2009''''' due to the competition's sponsorship by Peace Cup Organization Committee.{{cite news|url=http://www.sportsseoul.com/news2/soccer/pro/2009/0324/20090324101020100000000_6763655894.html|title=(ìì ì§ì¤) íë¡ì¶êµ¬ ë¦¬ê·¸ì»µ, ëªì¹­ ë¼ë ì 25ì¼ ê°ë§|publisher=Sportsseoul.com|date=2009-03-24|language=Korean}} This is South Korea's league cup competition for [[K-League]]'s 15 [[Association football|football]] clubs. The competition began on March 25, 2009, and ended with the two-legged final on September 2 and September 16. ==Format== ===Group stage=== All clubs playing in the K-league, except they are competing are [[AFC Champions League]]. In group formation, Group A was composed an odd rank clubs in previous season, plus newly formed [[Gangwon FC]]. Group B was composed an even rank clubs in previous season. All clubs are playing each other once, only winner and runner-up of each group go to knockout stage. ===Knockout stage=== Winner and runner-up of each group and 4 clubs are competing in [[AFC Champions League]] participate in this stage. this stage is tournament form. The draw for the knockout stage held on 9 June 2009 in KFA headquarter. ==Members for K-League Cup 2009== ===Group stage club=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} '''Group A''' * [[Seongnam Ilhwa Chunma]] (''2008 K-League 3rd'') * [[Incheon United FC|Incheon United]] (''2008 K-League 7th'') * [[Chunnam Dragons]] (''2008 K-League 9th'') * [[Daegu FC]] (''2008 K-League 11th'') * [[Daejeon Citizen]] (''2008 K-League 13th'') * [[Gangwon FC]] (''newly formed'') {{col-2}} '''Group B''' * [[Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors]] (''2008 K-League 6th'') * [[Gyeongnam FC]] (''2008 K-League 8th'') * [[Jeju United FC|Jeju United]] (''2008 K-League 10th'') * [[Busan I'Park]] (''2008 K-League 12th'') * [[Gwangju Sangmu Phoenix]] (''2008 K-League 14th'') {{col-end}} ===Knockout stage club=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} * [[Suwon Samsung Bluewings]] (''2008 K-League 1st, Playoff 1st'') * [[FC Seoul]] (''2008 K-League 2nd, Playoff 2nd'') * [[Ulsan Hyundai Horang-i]] (''2008 K-League 4th, Playoff 3rd'') * [[Pohang Steelers]] (''2008 K-League 5th, FA Cup winner'') {{col-2}} * [[Seongnam Ilhwa Chunma]] (''Winner of Group A'') * [[Jeju United FC|Jeju United]] (''Winner of Group B'') * [[Incheon United
